name: phoenix-liveview-component
description: Production Phoenix LiveView component with real-time updates
template:
defmodule {{module_name}}Live do use {{app_name}}Web, :live_view require Logger @moduledoc """ LiveView component for {{description}}. Handles real-time updates via PubSub and provides interactive UI. """ @impl true def mount(_params, _session, socket) do if connected?(socket) do {{app_name}}Web.Endpoint.subscribe("{{topic}}") end {:ok, socket |> assign(:loading, true) |> assign(:data, []) |> load_initial_data()} end @impl true def handle_params(params, _uri, socket) do {:noreply, apply_filters(socket, params)} end @impl true def handle_event("update", %{"value" => value}, socket) do case {{context}}.update(value) do {:ok, updated} -> {:noreply, assign(socket, :data, updated)} {:error, changeset} -> {:noreply, assign(socket, :changeset, changeset)} end end @impl true def handle_info(%{event: "updated", payload: payload}, socket) do {:noreply, update(socket, :data, &[payload | &1])} end @impl true def render(assigns) do ~H"""
<.header> {{title}} <:actions> <.button phx-click="refresh">Refresh <.table id="{{table_id}}" rows={@data}> <:col :let={item} label="Name">{item.name} <:action :let={item}> <.link navigate={~p"/{{resource}}/#{item}"}>Show
""" end defp load_initial_data(socket) do data = {{context}}.list() assign(socket, :data, data) end defp apply_filters(socket, params) do # Apply query params as filters socket end end
